About

Cultivating Young Minds
For Your Talent Supply

The right mixture of talents is imperative to drive a Tech Hub.

Industry leaders’ technology and business skills are utilised in order to mould the talent of Young Learners and Students into a high-skilled workforce and successful entrepreneurs, as well as empowering the role of Women in the technology industry by addressing these key areas:
Talent Development
Talent Attraction
Talent Retention

Young Learners

Programmes tailored for younger innovators that aims to nurture and empower creative young minds to explore their potential and follow their passion.

Cyberjaya Women Network

A collaborative effort between advocates in Cyberjaya to come up with initiatives to retain women in the workforce, bringing back women on career break and increasing women representation in senior management position.

Students

Assistance in pre & post-funding for all costs including equipment, infrastructure, hardware, software and operational costs.


Cyberjaya-Global Tech Hub Student Ambassadors

This programme enables students to be part of Cyberjaya’s wide network of talents and provides them with opportunities for:

Talent Development
Talent Attraction
Talent Retention
Talent Retention
Talent Retention
Talent Retention
Talent Retention
